name: Up911911-30 Second Armada
description:
Click left mouse on the screen to move  around.

Also works well on phones!

Shooting is done automatically you just need to be in range!

 (top tip attack from behind) 

(bigger fleets have longer range so go for the weaklings!)

Let me know if anything feels too difficult. this game has quite a few different enemies you will get to experience the  move powerful your fleet becomes.  I haven't had too much time to play test so excuse the inevitable bugs. If you find them I will fix them. (hopefully)
